Title: Sakebi
Director: TetsurÃ´ Araki, Takayuki Hirao, Satonobu Kikuchi, Masashi Koizuka
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Daisuke Ono
Plot: Eren encounters the very Titan that devoured his mother. Unable to move his body, Hannes steps in to protect him. Not knowing what to brandish their swords against, the Scouts battle on.
